alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 3:06AM AKST until December 08 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through Friday. The worst conditions are expected early this morning when south winds gust to 50 mph. Conditions might improve briefly this afternoon and evening as winds decrease, but winds are expected to turn northwest and increase again on Thursday causing a return to low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
